subject: Adding Junit to Eclispe
msgSnippet: Not sure if this is the right forum, but I am trying to get Junit to show in the drop down menu on eclipse. I have right click on the project and clicked on
messageBody:
Not sure if this is the right forum, but I am trying to get Junit to show in the drop down menu on eclipse. I have right click on the project and clicked on New and was expecting to see Junit as an option here which it wasn't. It also is not showing as an option under the Other selection either. This for:

Eclipse version 1.3.1.20100916-1201
Junit4.9b2
Junit4.5
Junit3.8.2

Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks, Greg
